mapper.insert: insert into board_mst values( 0, #{title}, #{usercode}, #{content}, now(), now() );
mapper.select: select bm.boardcode, bm.title, bm.usercode, um.username, bm.content, bm.createdate, bm.updatedate from board_mst bm left outer join user_mst um on (um.usercode = bm.usercode) where bm.boardcode = #{boardcode}

select bm.boardcode, bm.title, bm.usercode, um.username, bm.content, bm.createdate, bm.updatedate from board_mst bm left outer join user_mst um on (um.usercode = bm.usercode) order by bm.createdate desc, bm.boardcode desc limit #{index}, 10
